requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: 4th Gen Intel® Core i5 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400 (tested)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 960m 2GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GP
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 255 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Expect FPS drops if 32bit. A full and up to date Visual C++ installation from Microsoft updates is also needed.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GP

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Additional Notes: OpenGL v3.0 or above
